Burlington.Kernodle-Pickett House: Kernodle-Pickett House is a historic home located at Bellemont, Alamance County, North Carolina. It was built in 1895-1896, and consists of a 2 1/2-story, "L"-shaped frame main block with 1 1/2-story frame wings in the Queen Anne style. It sits on a brick pier foundation and has a multi-gable roof with embossed tin shingles.
